briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety Trial of Rimegepant for Migraine Prevention in Adults
officialTitle: A Phase 2/3, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Rimegepant in Migraine Prevention
summary: The purpose of this is study is to compare the efficacy of BHV-3000 (rimegepant) to placebo as a preventive treatment for migraine, as measured by the reduction in the number of migraine days per month.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in the Mean Number of Total Migraine Days Per Month in the Last 4 Weeks of the DBT Phase
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: OP and Weeks 9 to 12 of the DBT phase
